name: Common Cold
description: A viral infection of your upper respiratory tract.
treatment: Rest, fluids, OTC pain relievers, decongestants if needed.

name: Influenza (Flu)
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.
treatment: Antiviral drugs (if early), rest, fluids, symptomatic care.

name: Heart Attack
description: A blockage of blood flow to the heart muscle.
treatment: Call emergency services immediately. Provide aspirin if available.

name: Migraine
description: A neurological condition characterized by intense headaches.
treatment: Pain relievers, anti-nausea medications, rest in a dark room.
